title: Package for creating interactive and static overview calendars using tiles
text: Layers .geom inherit internally generated calendar layout mapping variables. gg_facet_wrap_months() provides uses lists sensible default layers can easily modified. Customise look calendar tile using geom_tile(), text number labels using geom_text().
code: library(ggplot2) make_empty_month_days(c("2024-01-05", "2024-06-30")) |>   gg_facet_wrap_months(unit_date,                        .geom = list(                          geom_tile(color = "grey70",                                    fill = "transparent"),                          geom_text(nudge_y = 0.25,                                    color = "#6a329f")),                        .theme = list(                          theme_bw_tilecal(),                          theme(strip.background = element_rect(fill = "#d9d2e9")))                        )

title: Calculate variables for calendar layout — calc_calendar_vars
text: .data tibble data frame containing dates plotted calendar layout date_col column containing calendar unit dates locale locale use day names. Default current locale. week_start day week starts following ISO conventions: 1 means Monday 7 means Sunday (default). label = FALSE week_start = 7, number returned Sunday 1, Monday 2, etc. label = TRUE, returned value factor first level week start (e.g. Sunday week_start = 7). can set lubridate.week.start option control parameter globally.

code: gg_facet_wrap_months(   .events_long,   date_col,   locale = NULL,   week_start = NULL,   nrow = NULL,   ncol = NULL,   .geom = list(geom_tile(color = "grey70", fill = "transparent"), geom_text(nudge_y =     0.25)),   .scale_coord = list(scale_y_reverse(), scale_x_discrete(position = "top"),     coord_fixed(expand = TRUE)),   .theme = list(theme_bw_tilecal()),   .layers = list() )

title: Make Monthly Calendar Facets — gg_facet_wrap_months
text: .events_long long format calendar event data date_col column containing calendar unit dates locale locale use day names.
